description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=36] The functionality of this aura that was super helpful got removed. Now it only triggers as soon as you can use the Reveal! spell and can't automark anymore [/size][/color][/b]

Similar to the Cos aura https://wago.io/COSInteractables this is a liittle Helper for the Spyevent in City of Threads.
When mouseovering over the spy they will be automarked and anounced in chat (both if and how they are marked/announced can be adjusted via custom options).
description.html: The functionality of this aura that was super helpful got removed. Now it only triggers as soon as you can use the Reveal! spell and can't automark anymore Similar to the Cos aura https://wago.io/COSInteractables this is a liittle Helper for the Spyevent in City of Threads. When mouseovering over the spy they will be automarked and anounced in chat (both if and how they are marked/announced can be adjusted via custom options).

comments.text: Looks like they've changed the unitid with the weekly reset.  And so begins a season long war of weakaura vs shit dungeon design.
[taggeduser]@Zynnlol#6120[/taggeduser] It only triggers on mouseover but maybe it got fixed i haven't actually done city of threads on retaiol yet been busy leveling chars.
I went in CoT 2 times, nothing seem to happen
[taggeduser]@kougasarth[/taggeduser] Havn't tested it since i created it but i havn't seen anything in the patchnotes so i assume it still does

changelog.text: trigger on getting in range of the extra spell instead. Not rly very useful but might be helpful for some
functionality got removed - delete this aura
